lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: In a state of altered power, we begin these games within the tower

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Ah! I see you have awoken, Adara

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Who are you? How do you know my name?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: So many questions, so few answers.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: You may call me Castellan.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Well, I should take my leave. Goodbye for now...

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Well, I should probably try and get out of here.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Wherever here is...

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Adara!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Altair? This 'being' brought you here too?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: If by being you mean the disembodied voice that calls himself Castellan then yes.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I am curious as to what he wants from us but I'd prefer to not stick around long enough to find out.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Magical floating orbs?

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I wonder if they can help us open the door and get out of here..

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I dont think we have any other options, lets give it a try

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Magical... orbs?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: They might be able to help us open the door and escape

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I hope so. The one on my side looks a bit differnt

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: wow! whats happoning it's folowing me...

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Are you ok is it hurting you

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: actualy it's not that bad I can controll it.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: And I feel weightless

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: I'm Flying!?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I can controll my orb

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: hmm It pulls stuff towerds it.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: I can defintly do somthing with this.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: The stairs are broken. I guess I could try to fly up instead.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Does this other orb fit into the 'circuit' on the wall?

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Might as well give it a try.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: This place is massive.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: So cool.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Overtheare that looks like the door!

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Thank goodenss we are free.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Hang on a second there is somthing wrong we can't go threw.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: You thaut it wuled be that eazy?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Don't worry this is just the beginnging.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: You agin. let us out!

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But why wuled you whant to leave, we are having so muvh fun.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: Pleas let us out. What did we do to deseve this?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Well come on up ther is so much more fun in store.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: What no come back.

lines.name: Altair
lines.text: Adara, we are going to have to do what he says for now.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: We should try to combine the abilities from both of our orbs to lift this pillar.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Another room?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Awww, are you having fun yet?

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Very much no.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: **laughs

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: It looks like that energy fades when it toches things.

lines.name: Adara
lines.text: But mabe the orb inthe cart will act diffently.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: In search of a wish to save those they hold dear,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: They heard of a place that could fix what they fear.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: They reached the tower, not knowing what was in store.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: If they had, the three friends might have never stepped through the door...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Upon entering the tower gifts where bestowed,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: One unto each, their new abilities they must decode.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: A fallen pillar or two, mistakes they did make.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Unbeknownst to them, something else was about to break...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Reaching the next room in this twisted tower,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The three friends thought they had a hold on their power.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But what they were holding had a hold on one of them...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The scorches outside reflecting the burns within.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Room after room, they searched in vain.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: For Caelum, this power started turning into pain...

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: It surged through his veins and entered his heart,

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Until his friends could no longer tell him and the power apart.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: The power overtook him, now no longer a man.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: He became something beyond what the two of you could understand.

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: Their wish had been granted, their loved ones were saved

lines.name: Castellan
lines.text: But only because the tower was satisfied with what Caelum gave...
